reviewText: Now, when I watched these episodes I LOVED them. But that's no suprise. Anyway, I think that Tomoyo should be Sakura's number one person, NOT Shaoran or Yukito!!!!Episode 9#: Sakura isn't cheerful because of what the brat Shaoran said to her last night. He was saying she's not strong enough to be the master. So, Tomoyo and Rika feel bad and take Sakura to the store to shop to cheer her up! But when they get to Sakura's house Rika is suddenly under a sword trance! A sword appears in her hand and tries to slash Sakura and Tomoyo. Sakura though uses to uses a card that way she could seal that Sword card away.Episode 10#Time has passed...Sakura and Tomoyo have known each other for a whole year now. When Sakura and Tomoyo go to the school festival they meet their parents there. But right away truth comes out. It turns out that Sakura's long dead mother and Tomoyo's mother , who is a owner of a big toy company, were counsins! But when Sakura's mother Nadeshiko died she was only 27. Sakura was only three years-old after it all happened. Tomoyo's mother Sonomi HATES Sakura's father because near the end of Nadeshiko's life HE was there more then Sonomi. Sonomi LOVED Nadeshiko dearly. Just like Tomoyo loves Sakura to pieces. It was a great shock to Sakura and Tomoyo that they were cousins. But that was the day when Sakura and Tomoyo told each other that they love each other very much.Episode 11#:Sakura is going to visit Tomoyo's house for the very first time. Because Tomoyo asked Sakura to come over because she had a problem she needed Sakura for. When I saw tha part, at first I thought something like this was going wrong, like if Tomoyo got ill or hurt or soemthing like that. I LOVE Sakura and Tomoyo so much that I even worry about then when something goes wrong!!! Mental, right? Anyway Sakura is in a state of shock when she sees Tomoyo HUGE mansion. Because Tomoyo's family are very wealthy. Sonomi comes from the toy company to eat cake with the two girls and talk with them. But Sonomi sometimes feels sad to watch the Sakura and Tomoyo play, for two reasons. The first reason is that the girls must remind Sonomi of herself and Nadeshiko. And since Sonomi already taught Tomoyo to stay away from men, she worried that Sakura might get mixed up wuith a boy and Tomoyo's feeling will get hurt. So, of course Shaoran just had to step in the girls way!!! That makes me gag!!! Anyway Sonomi got called to the toy company so she had to leave. Sonomi loves Sakura dearly. Because Sakura is the daughter of Sonomi's passed away counsin. Sonomi tried to spend as much time with her only daughter Tomoyo as well. When Sakura and Tomoyo return to Tomoyo's bedroom Tomoyo explains that the problem is that her box that contains something that's very precious to herself and her mother won't open. They have the key. But it just won't open. It's the Sheild card. Sakura uses the Sword card and cuts open the barrier and seals it away. Tomoyo reveals that her most precious item is an eraser. Why? Because that is the first thing Sakura ever gave her, and she gave to her when they first met!! Sonomi's most precious thing is cherry blossoms because it was Nadeshiko's favorite flower.I didn't get a chance to watch number 12 yet, so.I STILL THINK that Tomoyo and Sakura are better together then Sakura and Shaoran. Because honestly, I did not like the way Shaoran treated Sakura in the beginning. Also, Tomoyop treats Sakura like a sister. They care for each other, NEVER once had a fight. That's why I love the first movie better then the second.Do, buy this productIt's VERY touching!!!!It's worth your money.
Title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Friends Forever - Volume 3

reviewText: Pioneer does really good jobs with these DVDs.  The quality can be seen by its clear lines in the previous volumes.  The episodes that appear on this volume are:9) Sakura and the Mysterious Brooch (Sword Card) 10) Sakura and the Flower's Athletic Meet (Flower Card) 11) Sakura and Tomoyo's big house (Shield Card) 12) Sakura and the never-ending day (Time Card)Sakura catches a card in each episode.  She's slowly coming closer to getting all the cards back.  Each of these episodes tell a little more about the pasts of each character.  Especially episodes 10 and 11.  You learn more about Sakura's mother and about Tomoyo and her mother.  Another great DVD that should be in anyone's collection.
Title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Friends Forever - Volume 3

reviewText: some of the cards Sakura captors in these four episodes are funny to say the least, but there power is nice
Title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Friends Forever - Volume 3

reviewText: Sakura and the mysterious broochSakura, Tomoyo, and Rika go to a shop where they sell pins and they each buy one. Rika's pin takes control of her, and it turns out that the pin is really the Sword card.Sakura and the sports day of flowersThe Tomeada Elementary school has a field day, but the field gets covered in flowers thanks to the Flower card!!Sakura, Tomoyo, and a manionSakura finds out that Tomoyo has a box which has her and her mother's precious things. But the Shield card is preventing them from opening it.Sakura's neverending daySakura goes to school one normal day, but the next day, she repeats it. Only she and Sharon are aware of it. It's all thanks to the Time card.
Title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Friends Forever - Volume 3

reviewText: Now here's some great animation! It's nothing like the stupid dub Cardcaptors, it's over a million times better! It's so sweet and cute, and also funny! Buy the subtitled version instead of the dub. To all those people who buy the dub, you don't know what you're missing!
summary: I'd rate this a million stars if I could!
Title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Friends Forever - Volume 3

reviewText: And once more we enter the world of Cardcaptor Sakura! And this time we learn more about Sakura's mother, and that Sakura and Tomoyo are second cousins!First up, the battle for the Sword card. This one was in the dub, so I doubt there's anything I can say you probably don't already know.Next, another episode missing from the dub, the capture of the Flower card at a school track meet(they call it a Athletic Festival, but, whatever!). Here we also meet Sonomi, Tomoyo-Chan's mother, for the first time.Third up for perusal, the Shield card turns up in Tomoyo's house! I have only one thing to say: I WANT THAT HOUSE!! Tomoyo's got her own film screening room CONNECTED TO HER BEDROOM! GIMME, GIMME, GIMME!Finally, we end with another ep. that made the dub, the challenge of the Time card. Can you say "Time Loop"? Sure, I knew you could!Keep'em coming, boys! Keep'em coming!Scorpinac
Title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Friends Forever - Volume 3

reviewText: I love Cardcaptor Sakura. I used to be a long fan of Cardcaptors, but that was until I found the original uncut DVD at my video store. My opinion sure changed!This is a great vid to start out on, with some wonderful dialogue.Sakura, Tomoyo, and a Mansion is one of my favourite episodes on here, especially after Kero gets his cake ^^!Pick this up... I trust you won't be disappointed.
Title: Cardcaptor Sakura: Friends Forever - Volume 3
